entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Fog. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
